title: Your First Python Program
description:
Create your first Python program by using the `print()` function to display text. This exercise introduces you to Python's most basic output function.

Write a program that prints exactly: Hello, Python World!

Make sure to match the exact text including punctuation and capitalization.
starterCode:
# Your first Python program
# Use the print() function to display the message
solution:
# Your first Python program
# Use the print() function to display the message

print("Hello, Python World!")
hints: Use the print() function with parentheses
Put your text inside quotes: print("your text here")
Make sure to match the exact text: Hello, Python World!

testCases.description: Should not have extra spaces or characters
